pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interpretation of Forensic DNA Mixtures // Statistical methods and simulation tools for the interpretation of forensic DNA mixtures. The methods implemented are described in Haned et al. (2011) doi:10.1111/j.1556-4029.2010.01550.x, Haned et al. (2012) doi:10.1016/j.fsigen.2012.11.002 and Gill Haned (2013) doi:10.1016/j.fsigen.2012.08.008.
